class_notes: Pre-requisites: PSYC 200W/PSYC 385 are the pre-requisites for PSYC 430.  Students enrolled in PSYC 495A are highly recommended to take it. Class meets synchronous on TTH 6:00-7:15pm (EST) both days.
course_description: This course provides an introduction to advanced statistics and the research questions and designs that require their use. Topics include mediation and moderation in multiple regression, complex ANOVA, data reduction techniques, multivariate ANOVA, advanced regression, and resampling methods.
sections: Class Nbr: 1992, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 6-7:15p, Instructor: Y. Cheong, Status: Open
